official_title: To award a congressional gold medal to Ossie Davis in recognition of his many contributions to the Nation.
short_title: Ossie Davis Congressional Gold Medal Act
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Ossie Davis Congressional Gold Medal Act - Directs the Speaker of the House of Representatives and the President pro tempore of the Senate to make appropriate arrangements for the posthumous award of a congressional gold medal commemorating Ossie Davis and recognizing his many contributions to the nation.

titles.title: Ossie Davis Congressional Gold Medal Act
To award a congressional gold medal to Ossie Davis in recognition of his many contributions to the Nation.
